de.saxsys.mvvmfx

Interface ViewModel


  • public interface ViewModel

    Marker interface for a View Model. Some additional hints to this layer:

    Never create a dependency to the view in this layer - if you have to create a new view after a business step, notify the view with the NotificationCenter or a callback that the view can create the new view. When you write a new View you should create the associated ViewModel with tests before.

    Author:
    alexander.casall
